features: YOUR GOAL: Performance Driven Hair Care
OUR SOLUTION: Provides lasting moisture leaving hair soft, manageable and ready to rock. Organic argan oil and pumpkin provide mega omega fatty acids.
PERFOMANCE DRIVEN HAIR CARE: Deeply nourishes and replenishes dry, damaged hair. Reduces frizz, increases shine and elasticity and supports healthy hair growth
100% VEGAN: Vegan and certified cruelty-free. Also Paraben free, Sulfate free, Mineral oil free, Petrolatum free and Formaldehyde free

DIRECTIONS: Apply to wet hair. Massage into scalp and hair, working through the ends. Rinse thoroughly. Feel free to belt out some horrible 80s tune that you listen to when nobody’s around. Whatever, you totally do it.
body.description: ACURE Ultra Hydrating Conditioner | 100% Vegan | Performance Driven Hair Care | Argan & Pumpkin - Ultra Hydrating Moisture & Omega Fatty Acids | 8 Fl oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars stumbled upon a few months ago that has been an absolute game-changer for my hair.
reviews.reviewText: Intense Hydration: My hair tends to get dry, especially with the changing seasons, but this conditioner delivers some serious hydration. It leaves my locks feeling incredibly soft and manageable.Acure Ultra Hydrating ConditionerNatural Ingredients: I love that Acure uses natural and organic ingredients. It's free from harsh chemicals, parabens, sulfates, and cruelty-free, which makes me feel good about what I'm putting on my hair.Pumpkin Power: Yep, you read that right! Pumpkin seed oil is one of the key ingredients, and it's packed with vitamins and nutrients that are fantastic for hair health. My hair has been looking shinier and healthier since I started using it.Gentle Scent: The scent is subtle but delightful. It's not overwhelming, which is something I appreciate in a hair product.Affordable Luxury: While it feels like a high-end product, it's surprisingly affordable. You get excellent quality without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner! It makes me hair feel healthy and silky but also smells like a Christmas cookie (because of the almond extract). Only wish it came in a larger size because I feel I have to buy it often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells so good and fresh. Leaves my hair feeling very soft and clean! Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wallow in your childhood trauma
reviews.reviewText: Were you, like so many others, deeply traumatized by being forced to take cough syrup for a cold as a child? Do the memories of that awful taste haunt your waking hours even years later? Do you get a sweaty mouth anytime you smell someone else’s cherry flavored treats?If so, then this conditioner is not for you. It has the single most overpowering scent I have ever smelt from a hair product – maraschino cherries. The smell will permeate your entire bathroom as you shower and will LAST on your hair all day. My towel smelled like it, my shirt smelled like it, and every time the wind blew, I caught another goosebump inducing whiff.The nausea from the cherry cough syrup smell aside, this conditioner is WONDERFUL. My hair feels silky, smooth, and hydrated. It isn’t heavy – my hair air dried quicker than normal, with minimal tangling. I feel that the price is great for the quality of the product. I would happily continue using this conditioner if not for the smell.Do you like cherry scents? Do you have a masochistic need to wallow in memories of childhood illness? Are you completely nose blind? Then ABSOLUTELY get this conditioner – it works amazingly.But if you’re like me…maaaaaybe try another product from Acure’s line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Acure Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I have liked them all but this one leaves my hair so smooth and shiny. I love the smell. Smells like almond extract to me

reviews.reviewText: Treat smell and feel. Leaves my hair feeling silky without feeling heavy like other brands. Love the quality and ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just works okay. Hair looks dull. Hi
reviews.reviewText: This and the shampoo is highly recommended but makes my grey hair look dull. Won’t buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My FAVORITE Hair Duo
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been slowly switching my beauty and body products to ones that don’t contain parabens, fragrances, dyes, and other endocrine disrupters that you find in literally everything. Found this brand from someone on Instagram who focuses on products that nourish and heal the body without the harmful chemicals you find in most products. I’ve been using this for almost a year now and my hair feels so healthy and clean, and I feel good about using it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent conditioner! Really does make my hair softer but bouncier.. we’ll worth the price tag 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Frazzled chaos turns into curly bliss
reviews.reviewText: Oh my hair is just a tragic frazzled mess but with this product it not only smells like marzipan but it helps my hair naturally curl easier.I don't even know at this point with how many products I've tried but this works. Naturally drying my hair leaves nice and happy wavy curls and I just feel like this suits my hair perfectly.Pretty much this review will go onto the other product.The only thing I'm concerned about is I thought this was purely natural but there's about 50 ingredients with super long names and no description of what they do in particular like on some products.I'm trying to steer as clear as possible from chemicals and sulfates and the nasties most typical brands use that wreck your hair and leave you needing to buy 17 other products to fix the issues they caused.Otherwise though? If you don't care about those parts go wild! It's a great product :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: They've sent the wrong item twice
reviews.reviewText: Ive ordered this twice, and both times they have sent shampoo rather than conditioner.I've used the conditioner before which is great.
